## TextElementsRenderer.getMemoryUsage() method

Return memory used by all objects managed by `TextElementsRenderer`<!-- -->.

```typescript

```
<b>Returns:</b>

[MapViewUtils.MemoryUsage](./harp-mapview.mapviewutils.memoryusage.md)
